activities:
Daon has a range of products that enable identity assurance for a wide variety of applications.  The Daon identity assurance product suite provides the enabling technology wherever people need to be identified - extending existing IT investment, while providing the highest levels of security and flexibility to counter the risks of identity fraud across multiple sectors.

DaonEngine is the core flagship platform that enables customers to manage biometric data and associated identity functions in a scalable, reliable and secure manner. With DaonEngine, organizations can leverage multi-modal biometric technologies (face, finger, iris, hand geometry, voice, and others) and multi-factor authentication technologies (smart cards, RFID, passports, passwords, ID cards, and others) to provide a broad range of services including verification, identification, watchlist management, investigation and identity issuance.
